strings.gs_from_email_descr: Specify the from email address on any outgoing emails that get generated by your GS install
strings.gs_admin_descr: Attention: if you changed this setting, you will be redirected to the new path within 3 seconds after clicking Save updates.
strings.gs_login_salt_label: Extra SALT to secure your password with
strings.gs_custom_salt_descr: Leave empty for auto-generation of SALT from website API key.
strings.gs_editor_toolbar_custom_descr: Only works if Editor Toolbar setting is set to 'custom'.
strings.gs_autosave_descr: Autosave within edit.php. Value is the autosave interval in seconds (leave blank to disable)
strings.gs_image_width_label: Default thumbnail width of uploaded image
strings.gs_auto_meta_descr_label: Enable auto meta descriptions from content excerpts when empty
strings.gs_suppress_errors_descr: Force suppression of php errors when GSDEBUG is false, despite php ini settings
strings.gs_timezone_descr: Valid timezones can be found at php.net/manual/en/timezones.php.
strings.gs_merge_lang_label: Set default language for missing lang token merge
strings.gs_chmod_descr: See php.net/manual/en/function.chmod.php for reference. Leave empty to disable.
strings.gs_apache_check_label: Enable check for Apache web server
strings.gs_style_descr: Warning: changing this setting will flush the server cache.
strings.gs_ext_api_descr: Check to add an API item in the Settings sidebar (that you can enable/disable). See GS EXT API for more info.
strings.gs_cdn_label: Enable loading of external CDN versions of scripts (jQuery/jQueryUI)
strings.gs_cdn_descr: Uncheck to force loading from your own server.
strings.gs_sitemap_label: Enable Sitemap generation and menu items
strings.gs_ping_label: Ping search engines upon sitemap generation?
strings.gs_ping_descr: Only works if sitemap generation is enabled. Affected search engines: google.com, search.yahooapis.com, bing.com, submissions.ask.com.
strings.gs_debug_descr: Allows PHP errors to be displayed in front- & backend.
strings.gs_csrf_descr: See wiki. Do not uncheck unless you're getting the error message "CSRF error detected..."
strings.gs_canonical_descr: Use with caution - not compatible with some plugins.
strings.gs_uploadify_descr: Uncheck to turn off Uploadify in the backend. You are left with a plain HTML form to upload files instead.
